attacks.name: Constrict
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Octazooka
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, whenever the Defending Pokémon attacks, your opponent flips a coin. If tails that attack does nothing. (Benching or evolving that Pokémon ends this effect.)
